reviewText: I recommend this DVD to anyone wanting to know more about the fascinating life and career of Herb Jeffries.  From his time as a big band singer, through his taking the lead in establishing black cowboy films as offering a positive role model for children his life was about moving beyond racial barriers.  His life was one about love and living to the fullest with each day as a blessing.
THIS WAS THE BEST JAZZ DVD I HAVE SEEN IN YEARS THE SOUND WAS GOOD AND THE STORY WAS GREAT THANK YOU

I heard of Herb Jeffries from some cowboy friends. I looked him up and was so surprise  to find so much information about him. I felt like I hit the jackpot when I found his movies. What a great person.
